column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////BEST steakhouse in the city! Sexy Parisian decor and exceptional steaks and drinks. Must tries include old fashioned cocktails and violet smashes. In terms of food
column3: wedge salad and bone marrow are decadent. No matter what the cut
column4: the steaks are cooked to perfection. I enjoy mine medium rare and Bavette's has always delivered. Sides ranging from Brussel sprouts
column7: and truffle Mac n cheese are fantastic. Be sure to leave room for dessert!!
